TitlePage.Title: Automatic Documentation
TitlePage.Subtitle: a nice way to create documentations
TitlePage.TitleComment:
(this manual is still under construction)
This manual is best viewed as an HTML document.
An offline version should be included in the documentation subfolder of the package.
http://www.github.com/sebasguts/AutomaticDocumentation
